website_summaries.verdict: Uses no meat by-products and customers report this food improves bad breath odors.
pros: Formula includes increased levels of protein to promote healthy muscle growth in puppies
Owners say the quality of the coat of their puppies looks healthy after eating this food
cons: Some puppy owners report receiving expired bags of food
Some puppies have digestive issues after eating

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Do not buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this puppy food after reading positive reviews online, but then I noticed that Amazon-buyers reported differences in the kibble from the in-store product and digestive issues in their dogs. I checked out the food I got on Amazon before feeding it to my puppy and realized it's the smaller kibble variation that has been reported to give puppies diarrhea and a reluctance to eat. I will absolutely NOT be feeding this to my puppy. Furthermore, I have lost confidence in the Wellness Complete brand since they seem to be trying to pass off an unsafe, subpar product as a premium product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gizzi

customer_reviews.title: Difficult on my puppy’s Tummy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this food for my puppy because it showed as recommended by a couple sites and I wanted a grain with more nutrition than rice. While using it my puppy had spontaneous poops nearly constantly indoors. When I switched to a different dog food without barley my puppy had much better control and more regular/solid poops. I tried switching back to this food when I ran out of the better stuff and his poops reverted back to spontaneous wet poops. Although some people would say it was the “change” that caused this, I’d point out that he didn’t have any problems changing away from this dog food. Based on this I can not recommend this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Made my puppy sick- Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I think we got a bad batch as my puppy became sick after eating this food which is his regular brand/type. Once we got a bag from the local pet store, he began eating and feeling better. Thank you Amazon for your prompt refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Buy In Bulk and Save!!
customer_reviews.text: Great savings buying it in bulk. I have a Shih Tzu puppy since she was 2ish months old. She's now 5 months and the bag is barely dented. I'm giving her one full cup of a measuring cup when I fill her dish but it usually lasts 2-3+ days. I looked up which dog foods are good for her since so many kinds are filled with things that can cause long term harm. This brand was on the list of good kinds. Well worth the price and it seems like it should last at least a year+.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great food, Bulldog puppy approved!
customer_reviews.text: We moved our 3 month old American Bulldog to this puppy food after the food the seller had her on started giving her very runny stools. This has a much better fiber to protein amount as well as other important ingredients and has allowed our girl to have solid stools. She loves the food so much we had to get her a divided bowl to slow her eating.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: ... for a litter of pups and their coat looks amazing. They all loved it and put on great ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a litter of pups and their coat looks amazing. They all loved it and put on great weight from it. Ordered and went through 7 or 8 bags and will be using it until my pup is a year old. Probs my the best puppy food there is.
customer_reviews.author: Briar Lee Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because I love the wellness brand and have been feeding it to all my pups for almost 15 years. The review asked me to rate the flavor.. not sure how I can do that but my pups seem to devour the food so I’ll say it’s a 5 star rating for taste! I’d recommend this brand and this puppy food!
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS FROM AMAZON BUY FROM YOUR LOCAL STORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS FOOD FOR YOUR PUPPY!!!...WELL MAKE THEM SICK!....Gave my puppy diarrhea and a vet bill!...when u buy this brand from the store its fine...no problems!..but from Amazon its not good!!...just looking out for all you beautiful dog owners!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Product ok but don't buy with subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Amazon packed this 30 pound bag in one box with the rest of subscribe and save items. The washing machine detergent and the dishwasher pods containers were all broken and smashed. The wash scent boost was leaking. I had to rinse soap off everything after struggling to carry the 30 pound plus box up a flight of stairs!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater Puppy tolerated it when I added coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I believe wellness generally has good quality dog food. My puppy (German Shepard mix) got dandruff whole on this (my adult dog uses chicken adult formula and has done well her whole life). We tried to test the theory and yes, it was the food unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CA Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great puppy food for growing puppies.
customer_reviews.text: My new puppy can't have the large breed puppy kibble, so we came across this and he likes it I wasn't so sure about the oatmeal added and yet this is what he keeps going for, it has the small bites for small and medium.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Jo Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for my puppy
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our 13 week old pug this food since the day he came home and we mixed it with his old food (pedigree, yuck) until he got used to it. So far no issues 2 bags later and I have not experienced any mold like other reviews mentioned. It seems to be pretty fresh and I think Wellness uses quality ingredients that's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Dogs fur is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I adopted 3 Aussies and their coats were dull and dry on the chow kibble they were fed. I switched to Wellness and their fur now is silky and shiney. They are happy and the 15 year old has a new bounce of energy when out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: new puppy LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Had to transition our new puppy off her old food because she just wasn't eating it. She loves this food and has had no tummy issues with it. Will continue to purchase happily for us all.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Rod

customer_reviews.title: For us this was not a good fit. My puppy had a severe allergic reaction ...
customer_reviews.text: For us this was not a good fit. My puppy had a severe allergic reaction to something in this food. Most likely the rye as there was no rye in his previous food. He has hives and other issues because of it. *note that previously my other dogs had done good on this brand but this formula did not work for our youngest.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Watch pricing it varries wildly
customer_reviews.text: WAS a great value for the money till the price jump. Went up nearly a whopping 25% in one day. The product however is fantastic. Amazon should make them bring price in line again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product(s).... great for our Aussie puppy.... we mix a bit of quality canned food varieties and he loves it... his coat and well being is paramount.... fits the bill!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chas L

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Goldendoodle puppy since I got her at 4 months old. I have just purchased my last nag because she is about to be 1 year old next month. This food is of fantastic quality and I would recommend it for all dogs. I used Blue Buffalo with my Westie when he was a puppy and he had to go through many types before finding one he could tolerate due to all the added ingredients. The size of the kibble is small enough even for small dogs. I will be switching to an adult food of this same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley English

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Gave my pups diarrhea no matter how long they were on it. Not happy at all. I had to mix with an adult food to keep stools consistent. This gave my adults diarrhea too
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Dawg loves it!
customer_reviews.text: After many searches, reviews, and research, this won out for best quality at a reasonable price. I don't eat it but the dawg looks like she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JW-INFIDEL

customer_reviews.title: Puppies stomach does not agree.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this food because my 4 month old English bulldog puppy loves the Wellness Soft Puppy Bites. Unfortunately, that is not the case. This just does not sit well with my dog. I did the 10 day transitional period from her normal food as well. She likes the flavor (although she'll eat anything) but I'm forced to throw out the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cr0tchf4i

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy at a reasonable price - fine quality food!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dry dog food - very highly rated - actually rated 4.5 on a scale of 5, the best or one of the best recipes Wellness produces. I feel very confident using this food for my dogs (not just puppies, either) - and I add a considerable amount of fresh foods to it, as well. Vendor mails me my orders immediately; I get them very quickly; the food is obviously very fresh and, again, very fine; it comes well packaged -- and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It is rated one of the best puppy food. My puppy loved it and my adults wanted some as well. No complaints here. It’s been a great food.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten about 4 bags so far with no issues. My dogs eat it without complaint and it lasts them about a month and a half. I have three dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fish smell when opening bag. My pup likes the flavor, she looks wonderful and our vet approves that it has the proper ingreadients for a well balanced diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good! Dog would not eat and got sick
customer_reviews.text: Gave this food to my dog and she wouldn't eat for two days and was vomiting. My vet recommended to stop feeding her this kind of food since it has not gone through a complete testing method on ALL DOGS. Definitely talk to your vet about your dog and what kind of food she can eat before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Tere

customer_reviews.title: Puppy eats it all and is growing like a weed.
customer_reviews.text: My puppy hoovers this stuff up. I had issues with loose stools at first with this food, but it's most likely caused by faster than normal transition from the puppy food the breeder was feeding. Stool was regular and solid after a couple weeks in his new home and new food, and he finishes his food all the time. The vet says the pup's growth and weight gain are right on track and looks healthy. Can't ask for much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: wildseven

customer_reviews.title: i wish our puppy liked wellness better
customer_reviews.text: i wish our puppy liked wellness better. it has good reviews online and it's priced a lot better than other premium dog food brands. however, we have a picky golden retriever who's pretty particular about kibble. he liked wellness at first, but he really prefers a softer kibble like orijen. the wellness kibbles are a good size for puppies though.
customer_reviews.author: cabbs

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Two of my dogs had terrible diarrhea for weeks and once I changed to a different food both got well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Food/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes this dog food. After reading many reviews on dog food and spending many hours comparing prices, I decided to try this dog food. I think I paid $39 for the last bag-the bags are very large, and each bag lasts me about 6 months. It makes me happy to know that I am spending Less than $90 a year on dog food AND to know that this food is healthy and doesn't have all of the junk and fillers that most other dog foods have.
customer_reviews.author: R. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Gassy puppy
customer_reviews.text: I like the Wellness line because I trust the ingredients. I felt good about giving my puppy this food, but I have to say, it gave her horrible gas, and oftentimes, soft stools. For the first 2 months, our puppy scarfed this food down, and then she just stopped eating it. We switched her to Royal Canin and immediately saw an improvement in her bowel movements and interest in eating. I understand why people like Wellness brand, but it just wasn't for our pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Juliefromiowa

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: My puppy gobbles this up ( I add a little water). My vet okayed me using this.
customer_reviews.author: aerodach

customer_reviews.title: Works for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boston Terrier who has been on this product for quite some time. I tried a bunch of different foods before this, but they all had various problems--and she had a very sensitive stomach. This food works wonderfully for her and I've had no problems with loose stools. One thing to be sure of, if you're transitioning to this food, is to not do it suddenly--that may cause problems with the dog (including diarrhea). My vet advises slowly transitioning over to a new food, blending it in the old, and taking 1-2 weeks before the new food fully replaces the old. Completely changing the food can have a bad effect on some dogs with sensitive stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: killerchampgirl

customer_reviews.title: A winner with our picky pup
customer_reviews.text: Our doxle pup gets finicky about her food...about the time we're 3/4 through a 5lb bag, she's turning her nose up. Not so with this brand. We're on our second bag, no problems, no issues with stool, and except for her occasional persnickety streaks, she eats it up.
customer_reviews.author: Janell MichaelsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Boxer
customer_reviews.text: Our boxer was eating Wellness from his breeder when we got him at 6 wks. At almost 7 months, we have continued to give him Wellness and he's had very few episodes of diarreah and lost of appetite. I attributed these episodes to the all shots received before 4 months or overexcitement around mealtimes. We combine both dry and wet for him 3 meals/day, sometimes adding yogurt or fresh strawberries. The smell of stool is not as offensive I would think. Water is very important. He's currently at 50+lbs & developing beautifully. We don't feel bad giving him a bad treat every now & then because we find it to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C COSS

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Definitely different food than what is in the store and chewy.com. My puppy would not eat it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Runny stools
customer_reviews.text: Both of my puppies got terrible diarrhea from this food. I switched to something else and they were fine. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in Washington State

customer_reviews.title: Seems to like it very much and there has been no issues
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has been eating this for almost 6 months. Seems to like it very much and there has been no issues. I choose this one for the high ratings and no grain. I will transition her to Wellness adult when she reaches the age.
customer_reviews.author: nanalinda

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my puppy he was on another food that was too expensive, i then moved him to another food that he didn't like and gave him runny stool. I tried this food and within days my puppy was back to normal. I checked DogAdvisor and this food was rated 4.5 out of 5 stars. Its a great formula with natural ingredients and was highly recommended by the dog trainer at Petco. He loves the food and has had normal stools. I definitely recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Health Food
customer_reviews.text: No problems here getting any of the foster dogs to eat it. This came highly recommended, and I feel everyone should be mindful of what the dogs eat. Healthy pets are from good food and exertise~
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: We resuced a puppy at about 4 or 5 months old. He had juvienile mange and was a little on the skinny side. Since we started him on this food and his skin is healing faster and he is starting to fill out. Love Wellness we use the large breed for our other dogs too they love the taste and their skin is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: another dog goes down the road of a diet of wellness brand
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased another pup and immediately started him on Wellness products. We used them for 15 years with our last dog (White fish and Sweet Potato) as well as snacks.
customer_reviews.author: tonermd

customer_reviews.title: Little/picky dogs like this food
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian pups love this!! They were picky with multiple other food types we tried, and then just devour this food. Especially Sky who is 4 lbs won’t eat anything but he even loves this food. Really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too rich. Made dog gassy
customer_reviews.text: This food is very rich. Gave our puppy gas really bad. Had to try another food.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dog food, helps make my dogs skin and coat look healthy and physically has never looked better with the hound in him.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: This is good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: With so many dog food choices out there (and so many opinions)...it can be difficult to make a decision...So let me help, you can go the "research" route as I did (spent hours looking at different brands/reviews) or...you can save time and just stop here...You will not be disappointed...I have two German Shepherd's who truly love this food...I feed them this food dry (no wet food, etc) and they seriously lick their bowls clean at each feeding...Try it!
customer_reviews.author: tp23

customer_reviews.title: Great quality kibble
customer_reviews.text: Great kibble for the puppers. Ive been using this brand for a few years now and I've never had any problems thus far. It's a little pricier than other brands but the quality is definitely there.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Not for my puppy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a picky puppy. I started a slow blending of his original food with this product. Even though the ingredients seem healthy, etc. it gave him terrible gas and loose stools and he doesn’t seem to like it any better. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Better for tummy than Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is obsessed with this. He has wolfed down every bite. He had done stomach trouble worth Blue Buffalo, but when we mixed this in and replaced it fully, he became regular and happy again. A bit pricey, but highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fur pups love it
customer_reviews.text: My fur puppies loves this food. They are picky eaters but really like this food.
customer_reviews.author: M. River

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog food.
customer_reviews.text: We feed this to our mini-schnauzer. His coat is always nice, eyes are bright, and he has overall great health. I'd recommend this food to anyone who treats their dog like a kid. :-) By the way, I did do a lot of dog food research before choosing Wellness and I think it's one of the best you can buy. Price on this bag is fantastic from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Webhead

customer_reviews.title: I slowly switched back to her prior food and she started getting better. Tried this food again
customer_reviews.text: I introduced this food to my puppy slowly and she started crapping all over the place. I slowly switched back to her prior food and she started getting better. Tried this food again, same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Nafziger

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Dry Puppy Food ....
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my puppy based on the (natural) ingredients and endorsements from a couple of consumer sites. My puppy loves it ....and I'm ordering more !!
customer_reviews.author: pamela r.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended a dry food for my dog with a mixture of protein and some grain. He said theres emerging evidence from studies that links grain free good with heart disease. My pup has been eating this brand ever sincd I've adopted her 4 months ago and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Zoe loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD puppy likes this food. She was weaned onto puppy chow by the owners of the mother. We brought her home and changed to this without any upset stomach, diarrhea or other issues. An urgent care vet strangly suggested Iams or Science Diet when we told her we had this food. I don't understand that, but we'll stick with this unless Zoe stops gaining/growing or gets sick.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food. Bad pricing
customer_reviews.text: To expensive for this size bag of dog food. I started my puppies on this, and it became to much as they grew. Found another dog food with similar ingredients for $20 less a bag.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a fussy eater. I am so glad I found a brand she likes.
customer_reviews.author: brandydog

customer_reviews.title: They have better quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same brand of dog food in PetSmart. They have better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber.W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food, puppy couldn't process very well
customer_reviews.text: Got this food after doing some research. It caused our doberman puppy to keep having runny poops so we switched to taste of the wild and it got better right away. We ended up donating the rest to the local pet shelter. Food quality was superb just didn't agree with our pup.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cook

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: We give this food to our two puppies, mixed with the same brand and type of canned food. Our puppies gobble it right up. And there is no wheat or corn. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I felt this was the best quality grain puppy food that I could purchase
customer_reviews.author: qb

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff for pups
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this food. We started with a purina puppy food but it upset his tummy. We haven't had any issues with this food and the dog gobbles it up. I feel comfortable giving my dog this food as it has quality ingredients and is a better value than many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Orangemen4Life

customer_reviews.title: Our Corgi Puppy Love It!
customer_reviews.text: A premium dog food for a good price that our puppy loves.....what else can I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: T. Polar

customer_reviews.title: it’s okay
customer_reviews.text: My puppy doesn’t love the flavor but it’s super high quality
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love it! Their coats are beautiful and the kibble size is perfect for their little teeth.
customer_reviews.author: NailedIt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product in great condition
customer_reviews.text: The bag we received is far from its expiration date, doesn't contain any mold, and doesn't look dried out. I was worried after reading mixed reviews about this product. All looks well and the puppy likes it. It's a win-win
customer_reviews.author: A. Laren

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loved this; he's now old enough to eat regular ...
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved this; he's now old enough to eat regular food and so has been switched to what his *siblings* are eating! It's the only reason we've stopped buying it.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loved this food
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved this food. She loved it so much, she tore the bag open and ate as much as she could. Her stomach was so full, she couldn't move.
customer_reviews.author: OCM

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Wellness for many years and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product for dogs with weak digestion
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES this food. My french bulldog puppy has weak digestion system, but this one definitely lessened the burden on her digestive tracts. Definitely recommend this product for dogs with weak digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam B.

customer_reviews.title: My puppy wasn't please
customer_reviews.text: .... and thats saying something because she eats everything! She was not fond of this and it was almost impossible getting her to finish the bag. Start small to try out first.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff. Puppies always happy to eat it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest way I’ve found to buy this. all puppies have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: T. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Fed this to our dogs for a long time. Great brand. Great ingredients when compared to other dog foods. I still like to give them table scraps of real veggies and meat every day but I keep their bowls stocked with the wellness brand adult dog food (since they are no longer puppies) throughout the day when they need to snack.
customer_reviews.author: Renee H

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for a pup👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Love this food! My pup looks phenomenal! So far so good! Highly recommended 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dog extremely smelly diarrhea. After switching away from this product his diarrhea has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very good dog food
customer_reviews.text: Very good dog food!! My 2 puppies gobbled this up like it was thanksgiving! I love that it has all natural ingredients and it's not as flashy as blue buffalo
customer_reviews.author: Flauna

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old shihtzu loved it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this food because it stated it would help with my puppy fur as far as shine , I haven't seen that yet but we are still on the first bag....it did not give my puppy diarrhea as others stated
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: He is now six and in great shape so we gradually introduced this product to our ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried Wellness on our other Lab based on a trainer's recommendation when he didn't tolerate another "premium" brand well as a puppy. He is now six and in great shape so we gradually introduced this product to our newest puppy. He's done great on it. No loose stools and he loves it. I highly recommend Wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Healthy puppy
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my "set and save" so we never run out. I think my puppy would starve if we ever did run out and had to use something different. She goes though this bag about every two and a half months eating just shy of two cups a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: High quality food my dogs love
customer_reviews.text: I have found the Wellness brand to be very high quality dog food. I feed it to both my adult and puppy Shelties. They both love it!
customer_reviews.author: April Mulherin

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Best food and brand hands down. They will stand behind product no matter what .
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We have a young Shih Zhu, who was the runt of the litter, and underweight, and we wanted the best food on the market to get him up to his normal weight. I have a friend who fosters dogs and she recommended this product. We are so glad we listened to her. And the convenience of buying this online and having it delivered goes without saying.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little Maltese loves this food. He always seems to clean up his bowl during meals.
customer_reviews.author: IkeskiVT

customer_reviews.title: Price point high but okay
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it and it appears to have less moisture content than some less expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mink

customer_reviews.title: good price for this dog food.
customer_reviews.text: good price for this dog food. My dogs do not really care for the flavor of any of the wellness products but by feeding them this I can leave a bowl of food out at all times and they never eat more than they need!
customer_reviews.author: nhoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched my 5 month old puppy to Wellness, from Castor & Pollux Organix (a grain free.) I like the ingredients in Wellness puppy food and so far, after the first full 30 lb bag, so does my puppy. It's a healthy choice & we'll see how she continues to do with this food. =)
customer_reviews.author: scrumdiddlyumptious

customer_reviews.title: Great food and quality. My dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for our hound. He was not as eager as eating the food we bought him before but scarfs this stuff down! Amazing deal don't buy at Petsmart its way more expensive for a lesser amount.
customer_reviews.author: Haile

customer_reviews.title: He likes it and we're happy with product we've switched our adult dog to the ...
customer_reviews.text: We had my puppy on this since we've had him. He likes it and we're happy with product we've switched our adult dog to the same brand!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and he gobbles it up like he hasn't eaten in a month
customer_reviews.text: Puppy doesn't complain when eating it! LOL shipped on time, and he gobbles it up like he hasn't eaten in a month.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zellner

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My poodle loves this food. The Core version was just too rich and caused digestive trouble
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasty Food
customer_reviews.text: Love Wellness and so does my puppy!! She is very healthy, her coat is beautiful and she has no accidents with this food. So grateful I made the switch!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Our dog had chronic diarrhea from this kibble (otherwise healthy puppy). We switched to a different brand and grain free and within days her poop firmed up. Something in this did not sit well in her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Puppies love it!
customer_reviews.text: My puppies love this food. I started buying Wellness after reviewing the different dog foods online. Wellness was consistently the top-rated food for protein content and protein/carb ratio. So, I gave it a shot and my dogs could not be happier and neither could I. They love the food and I get the peace of mind knowing I am giving my dogs quality food to help them grow strong and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: katedylan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this for three months and her vet approves that it's not grain free. She seems healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: small bits work great for my pup at the time
customer_reviews.text: small bits work great for my pup at the time, then moved up to the bigger bites, bought wellness for my previous puppy (for 12yrs) and never had any issues, she had a sensitive tummy and worked great, so I continue to use wellness with my new puppy,
customer_reviews.author: Peter Licious

customer_reviews.title: MY BABIES LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LunaBear and DaisyMay, just love Wellness puppy products. They have it in the morning, lunch, then mixed in with Wellness wet for puppies. They very heathly and had no problems with Wellness products, in a month they will be going on Wellness Large Breed dry food. 8 Paws up!
customer_reviews.author: nicholebinz

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy Hated the Taste
customer_reviews.text: My miniature dachshund puppy really did not like this food. He hated the flavor and gave him really bad gas...we were both suffering. I switched to Blue Buffalo puppy food for small breeds. He's happy and so is my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my dog when she was a puppy. She liked it quite a bit. I have had to put her on a more specific diet but I would recommend this for a starter food. It is a bit pricy but not much more than other specialty dog foods.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: 2 cps a day keeps our Brittany moving and growing and keeps waste volume to a minimum
customer_reviews.text: Selected this food after much research. I believe proper nutrition in first year matters most. 2 cps a day keeps our Brittany moving and growing and keeps waste volume to a minimum. Amazon has the best price by about $5-10and Prime covers shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Broken recloseable bag
customer_reviews.text: The last two bags I received have had the recloseable zipper inside broken away from the inside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: woolimal maker

product_meta.title: Wellness Complete Health Natural Dry Puppy Food, Chicken, Salmon & Oatmeal
product_meta.description: Size:30lbWellness Complete Health Natural Dry Dog Food, Puppy Health Recipe, is healthy, natural dog food for puppies made with carefully chosen, authentic ingredients for the complete health of your developing puppy and provides whole-body nutritional support during the important foundation year, with the optimal balance of nutrient-rich whole foods to fulfill the unique health needs of your growing puppy. Wellness Complete Health Dry Dog Food supports your puppy's teeth and bone strength, healthy brain development, overall health, energy and vitality, optimal nutrient absorption, healthy muscle growth, all with natural and delicious ingredients to provide a guaranteed great taste that puppies love.
feature_bullets: ENJOY A LIFETIME OF WELLBEING: High quality proteins and wholesome grains are expertly balanced to deliver a complete diet packed with the nutrients your puppy needs to thrive; no meat byproducts, fillers, or artificial preservatives

SUPPORTS HEALTHY GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT: Guaranteed levels of DHA from Salmon Oil support brain development, antioxidants support strong immune systems, balanced nutrients promote optimal energy and Omega Fatty Acids ensure healthy skin and coat
WHOLE BODY HEALTH: Supported by omega fatty acids, antioxidants, essential vitamins and probiotics

FIND THE RIGHT FOOD: Wellness offers a full range of foods to support your dog's specific needs, including grained and grain free options, high protein recipes and limited ingredient diets for dogs with food sensitivities

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome, non GMO ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
